title: Cannot delete dapp from "Recent"

labels.name: core-ui-grooming
labels.description: To be reviewed on the next core ui grooming to add the issue to team board and set priority

body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: cannot use swipe and delete gesture to remove last visited dapps - when tap on "Delete", nothing happens (Android only). In chat it was replaced with long tap > delete , IMO it will be better to have this behavior for dapps as well.

#### Expected behavior
can delete browser entry

please see comments from @flexsurfer on the issue:
`maybe related to native animation, but anyway we need to change it on long press`

`"Clear all" also should be implemented`


#### Actual behavior
nothing happens

### Reproduction


- Open Status
- Open "DApps"
- Open any dapp and go back to main "DApps" screen
- Below "Recent" swipe to delete visited dapp from history


### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly 02/07/2019
- Operating System:  Android 8
maybe related to native animation, but anyway we need to change it on long press

"Clear all" also should be implemented 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/61697169-062e1280-ad37-11e9-8731-86258345d475.png)

https://www.figma.com/file/MYWmd1buvc2AMvUmFP9w42t5/Browser?node-id=3110%3A11223
cc @rachelhamlin
I'm going to put a bounty on this. @flexsurfer s or xs?
`s` if we're talking about implementing long-press and clear all feature

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 80.0 DAI (80.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8516/3336). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8516/3336). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $144,215.97 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)

Issue Status: 1. Open 2. **Cancelled** 

<hr>

__Work has been started__.


These users each claimed they can complete the work by 2 months from now.
Please review their action plans below:


**1) [elegant651](https://gitcoin.co/elegant651) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8516/3336?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=elegant651) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8516/3336?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=elegant651))_.**

I'll look into browser codes for resolving this issue.
**2) [sesamestrong](https://gitcoin.co/sesamestrong) has been approved to start work.**

This seems feasible; I will look into it and hopefully fix the bug!

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8516/3336).

I haven't started any development yet, but as of now, the swipe-and-delete functionality works both in an emulator (BlueStacks on Windows 10, as of 8/19/2019 3:40 EST on the Google Play Store release) and on an Android phone. Although part of the bounty is for adding long-press functionality, the part about fixing the bug is no longer necessary.
The video from the emulator (identical to what happens on mobile) is [here](http://www.yourfilelink.com/get.php?fid=2124171).
@Sesamestrong thanks for looking into it - I've approved you for work, are you clear on the remaining task to change the functionality to long press? :)
Yes I am, thanks!
